## Задача
Взять любую геометрию (не повторяться) .
• Реализовать численное моделирование задачи Стефана.
• Граничные условия подобрать на свое усмотрение.
• Провести исследование на разные решатели и
предобуславливатели.
• Вычислить погрешности решения.
• Найти оптимальный решатель и предобуславливатель.
• Оформить в виде отчета и отправить на почту (одинаковые работы
не принимаются).
## Постановка задачи
Задача Стефана:

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

Начальное условие

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

Граничные условия

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

![](data:image/emf;base64,)

![](data:image/emf;base64,) – место контакта с замораживающим каналом

Конечно-элементная аппроксимация

Применим МКЭ:

![](data:image/emf;base64,)
## Вычислительная область
![[Pasted image 20260114185728.png]]
mesh.geo
```
// --------------------
// Параметры
// --------------------
LX = 2.0;
LY = 1.0;
R  = 0.5;
p  = LX/30;  // шаг сетки

// --------------------
// Углы прямоугольника
// --------------------
Point(1) = {-LX, -LY, 0, p};
Point(2) = {-LX,  LY, 0, p};
Point(3) = { LX,  LY, 0, p};
Point(4) = { LX, -LY, 0, p};

// Стороны прямоугольника
Line(1) = {1, 2}; // левая
Line(2) = {2, 3}; // верхняя
Line(3) = {3, 4}; // правая
Line(4) = {4, 1}; // нижняя

Line Loop(10) = {1, 2, 3, 4};

// --------------------
// Левый круг
// --------------------
xc1 = -LX/2; yc1 = 0;
Point(5) = {xc1, 0, 0, p};       // центр
Point(6) = {xc1, R, 0, p};
Point(7) = {xc1, -R, 0, p};
Point(8) = {xc1+R, 0, 0, p};
Point(9) = {xc1-R, 0, 0, p};

Circle(5) = {6, 5, 8};
Circle(6) = {8, 5, 7};
Circle(7) = {7, 5, 9};
Circle(8) = {9, 5, 6};
Line Loop(11) = {5, 6, 7, 8};

// --------------------
// Правый круг
// --------------------
xc2 = LX/2; yc2 = 0;
Point(10) = {xc2, 0, 0, p};
Point(11) = {xc2, R, 0, p};
Point(12) = {xc2, -R, 0, p};
Point(13) = {xc2+R, 0, 0, p};
Point(14) = {xc2-R, 0, 0, p};

Circle(9)  = {11, 10, 13};
Circle(10) = {13, 10, 12};
Circle(11) = {12, 10, 14};
Circle(12) = {14, 10, 11};
Line Loop(12) = {9, 10, 11, 12};

// --------------------
// Поверхность: прямоугольник минус круги
// --------------------
Plane Surface(20) = {10, 11, 12};

// --------------------
// Physical группы (целые числа)
// --------------------
Physical Surface(1) = {20}; // область

// Грани прямоугольника
Physical Line(1) = {1}; // левая
Physical Line(2) = {2}; // верхняя
Physical Line(3) = {3}; // правая
Physical Line(4) = {4}; // нижняя

// Грани кругов (если понадобятся для Neumann)
Physical Line(5)  = {5, 6, 7, 8};   // левый круг
Physical Line(6)  = {9, 10, 11, 12}; // правый круг

```

## Вычислительный алгоритм
```Python
from dolfin import *

meshname = "./mesh/mesh"
mesh = Mesh(meshname + ".xml")
subdomains = MeshFunction("size_t", mesh, meshname + "_physical_region.xml")
boundaries = MeshFunction("size_t", mesh, meshname + "_facet_region.xml")

Q = FunctionSpace(mesh, "CG", 1)

DAY = 86400
Month = 30*DAY
tau = 0.5*DAY
sou = Constant(-30.0)
rhoL = Constant(6.0*1.0e7)
croS = Constant(2.0*1.0e6)
croL = Constant(2.5*1.0e6)
kS = Constant(1.8)
kL = Constant(2.0)
delta = Constant(1.0)

initT = Constant(2.0)
T0 = interpolate(initT, Q)
phi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 1.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta), 0.0,
(T0+delta)/(delta+delta)))
dphi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 0.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta),
0.0, 1.0/(delta+delta)))
k = kS + phi*(kL - kS)
cro = croS + phi*(croL - croS)

  

w = Function(Q)
bc1 = DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 5)
bc2 = DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 6)
bcs = [bc1, bc2]

T = TrialFunction(Q)
v = TestFunction(Q)

dx = Measure('dx', domain=mesh, subdomain_data=subdomains)
ds = Measure('ds', domain=mesh, subdomain_data=boundaries)

a = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T/tau*v*dx + inner(k * grad(T), grad(v))*dx
L = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T0/tau*v*dx

fileT = File("./results/T1.pvd")

t = tau

while t < Month:
	print(t)
	t += tau	
	solve(a == L, w, bcs)
	T0.assign(w)
	fileT << w
```

## Результат
t = 0
![[Pasted image 20260114190136.png]]
t = 5
![[Pasted image 20260114190206.png]]
t = 10
![[Pasted image 20260114190236.png]]
## Код исследование оптимального решателя и предобуславливателя
```Python
from dolfin import *
import pandas as pd
import time
from collections import defaultdict

def solve_with_solvers(mesh, w_ref, subdomains, boundaries, solver_name, prec_name):
	Q = FunctionSpace(mesh, "CG", 1)
	DAY = 86400
	Month = 30 * DAY
	tau = 0.5 * DAY
	sou = Constant(-30.0)
	rhoL, croS, croL = Constant(6.0e7), Constant(2.0e6), Constant(2.5e6)
	kS, kL, delta = Constant(1.8), Constant(2.0), Constant(1.0)
	initT = Constant(2.0)
	T0 = interpolate(initT, Q)
	phi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 1.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta), 0.0, (T0+delta)/(2*delta)))
	dphi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 0.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta), 0.0, 1.0/(2*delta)))
	k = kS + phi*(kL - kS)
	cro = croS + phi*(croL - croS)
	w = Function(Q)
	bcs = [DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 5), DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 6)]
	T, v = TrialFunction(Q), TestFunction(Q)
	dx = Measure('dx', domain=mesh, subdomain_data=subdomains)
	
	a_form = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T/tau*v*dx + inner(k * grad(T), grad(v))*dx
	L_form = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T0/tau*v*dx

	try:	
		solver = KrylovSolver(solver_name, prec_name)
		solver.parameters["absolute_tolerance"] = 1e-7
		solver.parameters["relative_tolerance"] = 1e-7
		solver.parameters["maximum_iterations"] = 1000
		
		t = 0.0
		it_count = 0
		start_time = time.time()
		while t < Month:
			t += tau
			A, b = assemble_system(a_form, L_form, bcs)
			it_count += solver.solve(A, w.vector(), b)
			T0.assign(w)
		end_time = time.time()
		return {
			"Solver": solver_name,
			"Preconditioner": prec_name,
			"Time (s)": round(end_time - start_time, 5),
			"Iterations": it_count,
			"L2 Error": f"{errornorm(w_ref, w, 'L2'):.10e}"
		}
	
	except Exception as e:
		print(f"Ошибка с {solver_name}/{prec_name}: {e}")
	return None

  
  

def main():

meshname = "./mesh/mesh"
mesh = Mesh(meshname + ".xml")
subdomains = MeshFunction("size_t", mesh, meshname + "_physical_region.xml")
boundaries = MeshFunction("size_t", mesh, meshname + "_facet_region.xml")

Q = FunctionSpace(mesh, "CG", 1)

DAY = 86400
Month = 30*DAY
tau = 0.5*DAY
sou = Constant(-30.0)
rhoL = Constant(6.0*1.0e7)
croS = Constant(2.0*1.0e6)
croL = Constant(2.5*1.0e6)
kS = Constant(1.8)
kL = Constant(2.0)
delta = Constant(1.0)

initT = Constant(2.0)
T0 = interpolate(initT, Q)
phi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 1.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta), 0.0,
(T0+delta)/(delta+delta)))
dphi = conditional(gt(T0, delta), 0.0, conditional(lt(T0, -delta),
0.0, 1.0/(delta+delta)))
k = kS + phi*(kL - kS)
cro = croS + phi*(croL - croS)

w = Function(Q)
bc1 = DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 5)
bc2 = DirichletBC(Q, sou, boundaries, 6)
bcs = [bc1, bc2]

T = TrialFunction(Q)
v = TestFunction(Q)

dx = Measure('dx', domain=mesh, subdomain_data=subdomains)
ds = Measure('ds', domain=mesh, subdomain_data=boundaries)

a = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T/tau*v*dx + inner(k * grad(T), grad(v))*dx
L = (cro + rhoL*dphi) * T0/tau*v*dx

methods = ["cg", "gmres", "minres", "bicgstab"]
preconditioners = ["jacobi", "ilu", "amg", "sor"]

t = tau

while t < Month:
	t += tau
	solve(a == L, w, bcs)	
	T0.assign(w)

methods = ["cg", "gmres", "bicgstab"]
preconditioners = ["jacobi", "ilu", "amg"]
results = []
for method in methods:
	for prec in preconditioners:
		print(f"Тестируем: {method} + {prec}")
		res = solve_with_solvers(mesh, w, subdomains, boundaries, method, prec)
		if res:
			results.append(res)
		print(results)

df = pd.DataFrame(results)
print("\nРезультаты:")
print(df.to_string())
best = df.loc[df['Time (s)'].idxmin()]
print(f"\nОптимальный выбор: {best['Solver']} с предобуславливателем {best['Preconditioner']}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
	main()
```

## Результаты исследования

| Solver   | Preconditioner | Time    | Iterations | L2 Error         |
| -------- | -------------- | ------- | ---------- | ---------------- |
| cg       | jacobi         | 1.06569 | 3054       | 3.4330203049e-03 |
| cg       | ilu            | 0.40109 | 1000       | 3.4317446926e-03 |
| cg       | amg            | 0.76676 | 240        | 3.4348700433e-03 |
| gmres    | jacobi         | 0.78127 | 3050       | 3.3036984747e-03 |
| gmres    | ilu            | 0.68671 | 1000       | 3.4325817092e-03 |
| gmres    | amg            | 0.90732 | 240        | 3.4334454002e-03 |
| bicgstab | jacobi         | 0.74348 | 2221       | 3.4319849638e-03 |
| bicgstab | ilu            | 0.58503 | 601        | 3.4296666319e-03 |
| bicgstab | amg            | 0.67161 | 125        | 3.4300880723e-03 |
Оптимальный выбор: cg с предобуславливателем ilu
